inboundReferences.contextLine: - [[negatives]] still did not merge [Bump Gateway API version to v0.5.0-rc1](https://github.com/knative-sandbox/net-gateway-api/issues/306). What's so hard with an update, they say! „Éü‚óèÔπè‚òâ„Éü. More:
